UltraVPS.eu is a brand of Bradler & Krantz GmbH Co KG. Founded in 1999 and headquarted in Bochum, Germany, our company is one of the most established European hosting providers. With our brand UltraVPS.eu we provide high-performance, enterprise-grade Virtual Servers for a very affordable price.

All Virtual Servers include:
---------------------------------

* Reliable and reliable KVM virtualization
* First-class Supermicro hardware only
* ZFS based Striped Mirrors (RAID-10) Storage
* Easy-to-use control panel (in-house developed)
* 1 IPv4 address and 10 native IPv6 addresses included
